nl.tue.multibrowsertest

Interface CapabilitiesProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardCapabilitiesProvider

    public interface CapabilitiesProvider
    Provides a list of DesiredCapabilities to an instance of MultiBrowserTester. These capabilities are supposed to represent the different browser types present on a particular host machine.
    Author:
    Lasse Blaauwbroek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.openqa.selenium.remote.DesiredCapabilities[] getCapabilitiesList()
      Returns the full list of different browsers supported.
      org.openqa.selenium.Dimension[] getDimensions()
      Returns a list of Dimension's the supported browsers should be able to take on, and can be tested against.
      org.openqa.selenium.remote.DesiredCapabilities[] getSequentialCapabilities()
      Returns a list of browsers that must be called sequentially on the host.

    • Method Detail

      • getCapabilitiesList

        org.openqa.selenium.remote.DesiredCapabilities[] getCapabilitiesList()
        Returns the full list of different browsers supported.
        Returns:
        Array of supported browsers

      • getSequentialCapabilities

        org.openqa.selenium.remote.DesiredCapabilities[] getSequentialCapabilities()
        Returns a list of browsers that must be called sequentially on the host.
        Returns:
        Array of sequential browsers

      • getDimensions

        org.openqa.selenium.Dimension[] getDimensions()
        Returns a list of Dimension's the supported browsers should be able to take on, and can be tested against.
        Returns:
        A list of browser dimensions
